entities.name: ivanova
entities.description: Ivanova is a player who managed to break through the opposing team's ranks and score Bulgaria's first goal.

entities.name: ryan
entities.description: Ryan is the Keeper of the opposing team.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is one of the Seekers who plummeted through the center of the Chasers.

entities.name: lynch
entities.description: Lynch is the other Seeker who plummeted through the center of the Chasers.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is a commentator who is excitedly shouting names of players.

entities.name: dimitrov
entities.description: Dimitrov is a player whose name is being shouted by Bagman.

entities.name: levski
entities.description: Levski is another player whose name is being shouted by Bagman.

relationships.description: Ivanova managed to dodge the Keeper, Ryan.
Krum and Lynch plummeted through the center of the Chasers.
Lynch is also chasing the Snitch.
